name: Mindless Runner (Charu12, devanshutak25, runvarunrun)
description:
An intense endless runner puzzle hybrid. A gruesome test of focus, dexterity and patience. 
Our entry for the 2019 community game jam!  

How to play:

Match the color on the left to the word on the right! 
Avoid the obstacles. 
Score 10 score to earn an extra life!



Controls: 

Move Up: Up Arrow / W
Move Down: DownArrow / S 
Back to Menu: M
